name: awfully

awfully adverb
(GREATLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
(US informal also awful) very or extremely, when used before an adjective or adverb: It's an awfully long time since we last saw each other. I'm awfully sorry, but we've forgotten to reserve you a table.
